data.name: FootnoteSettings
desc: provides access to the settings of footnotes or endnotes in a (text) document.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: AnchorCharStyleName
desc: contains the name of the character style that is used for footnote/endnote anchor in the text.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: BeginNotice
desc: contains the string at the restart of the footnote text after a break.
For footnotes only.

properties.name: CharStyleName
desc: contains the name of the character style that is used for the label in front of the footnote/endnote text.

properties.name: EndNotice
desc: contains the string at the end of a footnote part in front of a break.
For footnotes only.

properties.name: FootnoteCounting
desc: contains the type of the counting of the footnote numbers.
For footnotes only.

properties.name: NumberingType
desc: contains the numbering type for the numbering of the footnotes/endnotes.

properties.name: PageStyleName
desc: contains the page style that is used for the page that contains the footnote/endnote texts

properties.name: ParaStyleName
desc: contains the paragraph style that is used for the footnote/endnote text.

properties.name: PositionEndOfDoc
desc: If TRUE, the footnote text is shown at the end of the document.
For footnotes only.

properties.name: Prefix
desc: contains the prefix for the footnote/endnote symbol.

properties.name: StartAt
desc: contains the first number of the automatic numbering of footnotes/endnotes.

properties.name: Suffix
desc: contains the suffix for the footnote/endnote symbol.
